hero.headline: Your Home, Harmonized.
hero.subheadline: The privacy-focused, self-hosted solution to manage shopping lists, family budgets, and chores. Your data stays in your home.

featuresSection.title: Everything you need to run your household

shopping.title: Smart Shopping
shopping.description: Real-time sync lists. Never forget milk again. Add items as you notice they are missing.

budget.title: Budget Control
budget.description: Track expenses, set monthly limits, and see where your money goes with clear charts.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Self-hosted with Docker. Your data lives on your server, not in a corporation's cloud.
